comments.content: Love it. What will you do with it?

Thanks for the comments, glad you like the idea.!

Started out wanting to say something about the noose - and wound up talking about capital punishment in general. I thought that the game Hangman, made for a recognizable metaphor.

I like the font that came out of this concept. The many aggressive quick strokes which comprise a letter form can be taken as to represent many voices - at least in my mind they can ;) When finished I hope to get this piece out there \>\>\> somehow, either on a canvas, print, or submitting it as a cartoon.
I want to see it if you take it further, please. You may contact me at [mvkoppa@mwt.net](mailto:mvkoppa@mwt.net). Thanks.
